title: Brzeżany, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
text:
Brzeżany is a village in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20G%C3%B3ra">Gmina Góra</a>, within <a href="G%C3%B3ra%20County">Góra County</a>, <a href="Lower%20Silesian%20Voivodeship">Lower Silesian Voivodeship</a>, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in <a href="Germany">Germany</a>.
It lies approximately north-west of <a href="G%C3%B3ra">Góra</a>, and north-west of the regional capital <a href="Wroc%C5%82aw">Wrocław</a>. And 315 km (196 mi) west from the nations capital <a href="warsaw">warsaw</a>.
